articles.content: Margot Robbie took a break from pink dresses and dazzled in a black bustier dress. The dress, let us tell you, was a recreation by Schiaparelli of Solo in the Spotlight Barbie dress from 1960s.

articles.title: BTS's Jimin Opens Up About His Past Mental Health Struggles - Koreaboo
articles.description: In BTS's newly released book, Jimin reveals his candid thoughts and feelings when he was going through mental anguish back in 2017 and 2018.
articles.content: A rare, heartfelt revelation of the mental turmoil behind the spotlight is laid bare in BTS‘s newly published memoir, “Beyond the Story: 10-Year Record of BTS.” The golden-voiced Jimin, beloved for h… [+2759 chars]
